notes: Counts are rounded to the nearest 100. Percentages are calculated from unrounded counts and rounded to the nearest 10th of a percent. Details may not add to totals because of rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Early Career Doctorates Survey, 2017.
